calm.name: Calming
calm.description: Reduces sanity loss by 10% during expeditions.

insight.name: Insight
insight.description: Increases the chance of finding rare items by 5%.

spirit_vision.name: Spirit Vision
spirit_vision.description: Allows the user to see hidden details in mystical reports.

physical_boost.name: Physical Boost
physical_boost.description: Increases work efficiency, yielding 20% more pence.
